title: _tomcc：明天将发布Build 4
author: ufof
txt_content:
Ok, lefties will have to endure another day playing with the wrong had :P Build 4 will be released tomorrow, it's a bit too broken!
_tomcc：左撇子设置恐怕又要耽误一天做完了 :P Build 4明天将会发布，现在还有许多问题呢！
